description: Port 5001 is running backend API (JSON) but should run Vite UI (HTML). Diagnose why serve.py conflicts with Luminar Nexus and fix it.
problem: When running `python3 -m aurora_x.serve`, port 5001 shows JSON API routes instead of Vite HTML UI
root_cause_investigation: Check what aurora_x/serve.py does - what port does it default to?
Check if there are TWO backend servers (serve.py and server/index.ts)
Determine: should serve.py exist, or is it redundant?
expected_outcome: Users open http://localhost:5001 and see Aurora UI, not JSON
